001package src.pkg_commands;
002import src.pkg_models.Player;
003import src.pkg_game.GameEngine;
004
005
006/**
007 * Command that handles unrecognized player inputs.
008 * Displays a message indicating an unknown command.
009 * 
010 * @author Pierre MATATR
011 */
012public class UnknownCommand extends Command
013{
014    /**
015     * Executes the "Unknown" command behavior by notifying the player 
016     * that the input is invalid.
017     * 
018     * @param pPlayer      the player executing the command.
019     * @param pGameEngine  the game engine managing interactions.
020     */
021    @Override
022    public void execute(final Player pPlayer, final GameEngine pGameEngine) {
023        pGameEngine.getGui().println("Unknown command !");
024
025    }
026}
